sys_transform_map.name: Import Historic NeedIt Data

sys_update_version.name: sys_transform_map_13d5bc714fb13200cb281b818110c71e
sys_update_version.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_transform_map"> <sys_transform_map action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>true</active> <copy_empty_fields>false</copy_empty_fields> <enforce_mandatory_fields>All Fields</enforce_mandatory_fields> <name>Import Historic NeedIt Data</name> <order>100</order> <run_business_rules>false</run_business_rules> <run_script>true</run_script> <script><![CDATA[(function transformRow(source, target, map, log, isUpdate) { // If the source data does not have a u_requested_for_email field, // create the target email address from the Requested for value. Email addresses // have the format firstname.lastname@example.com. Convert the u_requested_for // value to lowercase. Replace the space with a . and concatenate with // @example.com if(!("u_requested_for_email" in source)){ var name = source.u_requested_for.toLowerCase(); target.u_requested_for_email = name.replace(" ", ".") + "@example.com"; } })(source, target, map, log, action==="update");]]></script> <source_table>x_58872_needit_historic_</source_table> <sys_class_name>sys_transform_map</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2017-03-29 20:18:26</sys_created_on> <sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update> <sys_id>13d5bc714fb13200cb281b818110c71e</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Import Historic NeedIt Data</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="NeedIt" source="x_58872_needit">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade> <sys_scope display_value="NeedIt">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_transform_map_13d5bc714fb13200cb281b818110c71e</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2017-03-29 20:47:46</sys_updated_on> <target_table>x_58872_needit_needit</target_table> </sys_transform_map> </record_update>
